docs.lead_paragraph: Setting aside for a few hours the pressures of trying to calm the world's trouble spots, President Barack Obama assumed the role of spectator for something more joyous: the wedding of the first family's longtime chef and friend.

headline.main: Obamas Attend Wedding of Their Longtime Chef
headline.print_headline: Obamas Attend Wedding of Their Longtime Chef

docs.snippet: Setting aside for a few hours the pressures of trying to calm the world's trouble spots, President Barack Obama assumed the role of spectator for something more joyous: the wedding of the first family's longtime chef and friend.

docs.lead_paragraph: A guide to cultural and recreational events in Connecticut.

docs.lead_paragraph: President Barack Obama, First Lady Michelle Obama and their two daughters on Saturday attended the wedding of their long-time friend and food guru Sam Kass to media personality Alex Wagner at a farm outside New York City, the White House said.

headline.main: Obama Family Attends Long-Time Aide's Wedding to TV Journalist
headline.print_headline: Obama Family Attends Long-Time Aide's Wedding to TV Journalist

docs.snippet: President Barack Obama, First Lady Michelle Obama and their two daughters on Saturday attended the wedding of their long-time friend and food guru Sam Kass to media personality Alex Wagner at a farm outside New York City, the White House said.

docs.lead_paragraph: President Barack Obama on Saturday temporarily set aside the pressures of trying to calm the world's trouble spots and assumed the role of spectator for something more joyous: the wedding of the Obama family's longtime chef and friend.

headline.main: Longtime Personal Chef to Obama Weds MSNBC Host
headline.print_headline: Longtime Personal Chef to Obama Weds MSNBC Host

docs.snippet: President Barack Obama on Saturday temporarily set aside the pressures of trying to calm the world's trouble spots and assumed the role of spectator for something more joyous: the wedding of the Obama family's longtime chef and friend.

docs.lead_paragraph: Mr. Kass, the first family’s personal chef, has one of the highest public profiles of anyone in the East Wing and a window into the zealously guarded space and tastes of the Obama White House.

headline.main: Sam Kass, the Obamas’ Foodmaster General

docs.abstract: Sam Kass, first family's personal chef, has one of the highest public profiles of anyone in the East Wing and a window into the zealously guarded space and tastes of the Obama White House; he cooks for Obamas five nights a week and is point man and public face of Michelle Obama's Let's Move! fitness program.
docs.snippet: Mr. Kass, the first family’s personal chef, has one of the highest public profiles of anyone in the East Wing and a window into the zealously guarded space and tastes of the Obama White House.

docs.lead_paragraph: Readers respond to an editorial about the scientific research on recommended levels of salt consumption.
